articles.title: Joint statement by President Costa and by President von der Leyen on Greenland - consilium.europa.eu
articles.description: President of the European Council, António Costa, and President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, issued a joint statement on Greenland.
articles.content:
Territorial integrity and sovereignty are fundamental principles of international law. They are essential for Europe and for the international community as a whole.
We have consistently underlined o… [+624 chars]
